firstRibbon.text: The Bellagio Apartments are located in Northwest Scottsdale, with easy access to 51 freeway/Loop 101 and near a wide variety of shopping centers, business and recreational activities. Kierland Commons, The Promenade and Desert Ridge Marketplace are minutes away! A pet friendly community just momments from your favorite shopping, fine dining and Scottsdale & Paradise Valley Community College. Discover the special reasons for making Bellagio your home.
firstRibbon.title: The Bellagio Apartment homes in Scottsdale, AZ

quote.text: I have to say that it was one of the best places I have ever lived.

firstRibbon.text: Bellagio offers world-class features inside and surrounding your apartment. With stainless appliance, extra storage, a dog park and in-unit laundry, your apartment is a pet-friendly dream. The community comes with a resort-style heated pool, fitness center, covered parking, grill area, and package service. Come schedule a tour today.

firstRibbon.text: Live life in a prime Scottsdale location, near top-notch shopping options at Kierland Commons, not far from the one-of-a-kind Musical Instrument Museum, close to quality medical facilities at Mayo Clinic and just minutes from multi-use trails at the McDowell Mountains, Pinnacle Peak and Piestewa Peak. Convenient access to Loop 101 and State Route 51 make it easy to explore the Valley.
